title: Random Leaverbuster
body: Ok, so as im in a thunderstorm in perth, i started a normal game, and i lag the whole game, trying to fix the problem by dcing and rcing, after the game, i play a couple customs with my friend and then i try and start an aram game. Then it comes up with a 10 min leaverbuster... i didnt even get a notification for it, and i didnt quit any queues today, i only quit a custom 1v1 game with my friend. So idk what the hell is going on, dcing and rcing twice doesnt seem that bad... but i think i should have gotten a notification for it, and if it was from that custom 1v1 game i had with my friend that i quit, then there is a bug. Someone Please Help Me {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Leaverbuster won't punish for leaving custom games, it will warn you however your leaver level will not increase.

Disconnecting and reconnecting with any lengthy period in between may raise your leaver level, you wouldn't be punished just for leaving one game it takes multiple times afk'ing/leaving games to trigger a leaverbuster punishment.

Low priority queues can not and will not be removed under any circumstance, same goes for any punishment laid down by leaverbuster.

Read more about leaverbuster and how it works [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).
